title: Trump rushes to Supreme Court, again and again
text:
Trump rushes to Supreme Court, again and again 6:24am EST - 02:09 
The Trump Administration has repeatedly tried to appeal cases directly to the Supreme Court, skipping the federal circuit appeals level, a move that legal experts say is unusual and could have repercussions for the administration and the judiciary system. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Trump Administration has repeatedly tried to appeal cases directly to the Supreme Court, skipping the federal circuit appeals level, a move that legal experts say is unusual and could have repercussions for the administration and the judiciary system.
